title: Mamdani ‘Brilliant' for Affordability Focus: Kimball
description:
Andrew Kimball, President & CEO of the NYC Economic Development Corporation, says Mayor-elect’s focus on affordability clearly resonated with voters. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that affordability is fundamentally an economic development issue and key to the city’s long-term strength.
 (Source: Bloomberg)
